title: Maki-chan, It’s Like That!
detail_text: <:th_ch0209/>*Stare*~....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Wh-, what is it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I was just thinking, Maki-chan, you’re somewhat like a cat….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Huh? How exactly?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I can’t really explain it well…. You usually seem cool, and yet kind, like a cat, is it because you’re whimsical?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>“Is it?” you say, don’t ask me. Plus, what do you mean I always seem cool yet kind? That I’m too soft?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>No. That’s not it. Umm, earlier, when I can’t open my bottle, you opened it for me right? Also, after practice, when I was searching for my socks, you went looking with me. Then….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>O-, okay I get it! I don’t really think that’s being kind. It’s just normal<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>The kindest thing is to do good things and act like it was nothing…. Maki-chan, I like you<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>….gh!! Th-, think however you want…. I don’t really hate you either, Rina<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
